description:
The idols embark on their first tour, facing challenges and growth as they shine together on stage. Through shared determination and support, they discover new strengths, inspiring themselves and those around them to keep moving forward.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ima, Kono Toki dake no Kagayaki
The Brilliance of This Moment Alone
今, この時だけの輝き
